name: JemSoftware
subtitle: All my apps in one place.
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: Tanuki's Stash
apps.subtitle: Open source e621 client for iOS built with SwiftUI

versions.localizedDescription:
This release including a number of improvements:

    -Support for downloading videos and photos to your photo library
    -Dynamic tag suggestions from the e621 API
    -Toggle to switch between e621 and e926 without installing different versions of the app
    -Added field to input account username, to be used in a later release

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App saves photos to your Photo Library.
